content: goddess afghan a beautiful cuddly afghan designed especially for my sister diana s birthday thus the name of the piece after the roman goddess of the hunt materials & supplies 45 oz café worsted weight yarn size k crochet hook directions row 1 chain 201 single_crochet second chain from hook double_crochet in next chain *single_crochet in next chain double_crochet in next chain repeat from * across chain 1 turn 200 sts row 2 *single_crochet in double_crochet double_crochet in single_crochet repeat from * across chain 1 turn 200 sts row 3-12 repeat row 2 row 13 single_crochet in each st across chain 3 turn 200 single_crochet row 14 double_crochet in each single_crochet across chain 1 turn 200 double_crochet row 15 single_crochet in each double_crochet across chain 1 turn 200 single_crochet row 16-39 repeat row 2 row 40-42 repeat row 13-15 row 43-77 repeat row 2 row 78-80 repeat row 13-15 row 81-104 repeat row 2 row 105-107 repeat row 13-15 row 108-119 repeat row 2 do not finish off at end of row 119 border round 1 working in ends of row single_crochet evenly along edge 3 single_crochet in corner working in free loops of foundation chain single_crochet in each loop across 3 single_crochet in corner working in ends of row of edge single_crochet evenly along edge 3 single_crochet in corner working in top of row 119 single_crochet across join with slip_stitch to beg single_crochet chain 1 turn round 2 single_crochet in each single_crochet around all four sides work 3 single_crochet in each corner finish off weave in ends every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of these instructions we cannot be responsible for human error differences in individual stitching techniques or typographical errors copyright 2007 c l halvorson
